message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This item is not just any commodity; it's a treasure that has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs and desires. Given its unparalleled quality and significance, we believe its worth is at least $10,000. Considering our mutual respect and understanding, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to purchase this product at the same value. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this further, so we can arrange a convenient time to discuss the details. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable piece into your possession.
